scormc2.name: C3 Scorm Plugin
scormc2.description: A Scorm 1.2 and 2004 Plugin for Construct 3

isScormInitialised.description: Check if the game is connected to the LMS

setLMSValue.description: Update a value on the LMS (refer on the Scorm 1.2 / 2004 documentation for possible values).

name.name: Name
name.desc: Name of the value to set.

doLMSCommit.description: Commit the updated values on the LMS server side.

doTerminate.description: Close the connexion with the LMS.

getLastError.description: Get the last Scorm error message.

getLastErrorID.description: Get the last Scorm error ID.

getLMSValue.description: Get a value from the LMS (refer on the Scorm 1.2 / 2004 documentation for possible values).

name.name: Name
name.desc: Name of the value to get.
